raw_body: Captain GALHENAGE RUPADEVA (Retired Commander SL Navy RSP and Old Boy of Nalanda College,​ Colombo),​ beloved husband of Sujeewa Dharmasena,​ loving father of Dr Teluka Galhenage (son) and Dr Pamoda Galhenage (Daughter),​ brother of late Rupa Perera,​ late Tissa Galhenage,​ late Galhenage Harischandra,​ late Hemamalini Ekanayake,​ brother-in-law of late Dudley Perera,​ Swarna Galhenage,​ Lakshmi Galhenage,​ late Raja Perera,​ Ranjan Dharmasena,​ Swarna Mudalige,​ late Mahesh Perera and Nelum Dharmasena,​ passed away peacefully in Parmo,​ Ohio,​ USA. His remains will be cremated at the Jardine Funeral Home Crematorium in Ohio,​ USA on Thursday July 20th 2023,​ attended by close family and friends.044744
